SEARCH
Package src.interfaces

Interface IMedicineRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
MedicineRepository
public interface IMedicineRepository
Interface defining operations for managing medicine inventory

  • Method Details

    • addMedicine

      void addMedicine(MedicationStorage medicationStorage, int stock, int lowStockAlert)
      Adds a new medicine to the inventory
      Parameters:
      medicationStorage - The medication storage object containing medicine details
      stock - Initial stock quantity
      lowStockAlert - Threshold for low stock alert

    • getMedicine

      MedicationStorage getMedicine(String medicineName)
      Retrieves medicine details by name
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      Returns:
      MedicationStorage object containing medicine details

    • getAllMedicines

      HashMap<String,MedicationStorage> getAllMedicines()
      Gets all medicines in the inventory
      Returns:
      HashMap containing medicine names mapped to their storage details

    • getStock

      int getStock(String medicineName)
      Gets current stock level for a medicine
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      Returns:
      Current stock quantity

    • setStock

      void setStock(String medicineName, int stock)
      Updates stock level for a medicine
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      stock - New stock quantity

    • getStockAlert

      int getStockAlert(String medicineName)
      Gets low stock alert threshold for a medicine
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      Returns:
      Low stock alert threshold

    • setStockAlert

      void setStockAlert(String medicineName, int lowStockAlert)
      Sets low stock alert threshold for a medicine
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      lowStockAlert - New low stock alert threshold

    • checkLowStock

      void checkLowStock()
      Checks inventory for medicines below their low stock threshold

    • updateStatus

      void updateStatus(String medicineName, String status)
      Updates the status of a medicine
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      status - New status to set

    • checkReplenishReq

      void checkReplenishReq()
      Checks for medicines requiring replenishment

    • deleteMedicine

      void deleteMedicine(String medicineName)
      Removes a medicine from the inventory
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine to delete

    • updateMedicine

      void updateMedicine(String medicineName, int stock, int lowStockAlert)
      Updates medicine details in the inventory
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine
      stock - New stock quantity
      lowStockAlert - New low stock alert threshold
